Detailed Description

Creates functions from their name for marker-joint optimization.

Constraint< T > roboptim::retargeting::MarkerFunctionFactory::buildConstraint ( const std::string &  name)

Instantiate a constraint from its name.

This method creates a constraint object from the constraint name.

Parameters:
[in]namefunction name
Returns:
newly created constraint object
Template Parameters:
Tfunction type (e.g. DifferentiableFunction)

References roboptim::retargeting::Constraint< T >::function, roboptim::retargeting::Constraint< T >::intervals, roboptim::retargeting::Constraint< T >::scales, roboptim::retargeting::Constraint< T >::stateFunctionOrder, and roboptim::retargeting::Constraint< T >::type.

Referenced by roboptim::retargeting::MarkerProblemBuilder< T >::operator()().

template<typename T >
boost::shared_ptr< T > roboptim::retargeting::MarkerFunctionFactory::buildFunction ( const std::string &  name)

Instantiate a function from its name.

This method creates a function (cost or constraint) from its name.

Parameters:
[in]namefunction name
Returns:
shared pointer to the newly created function
Template Parameters:
Tfunction type (e.g. DifferentiableFunction)

References roboptim::retargeting::detail::MarkerFunctionFactoryMapping< T >::Mapping::factory, and roboptim::retargeting::detail::MarkerFunctionFactoryMapping< T >::Mapping::name.

Referenced by roboptim::retargeting::MarkerProblemBuilder< T >::operator()().

std::vector< std::string > roboptim::retargeting::MarkerFunctionFactory::listFunctions ( ) [inline, static]

List supported functions.

Each element of this string can be passed to buildFunction method to create the corresponding function.
